author: The Straits Times
title: Ground News - Three dead as Storm Gerrit batters Britain
text:
Summary by The Straits Times December 29, 2023 5:17 AMOfficials warn that storm conditions are “making driving hazardous”, as a car carrying three men falls into a river. Share menu More
Filters 5 Articles 5 Articles All Left Center Right
The Straits Times Lean Right Mixed Factuality Media Conglomerate: Singapore Press Holdings Three dead as Storm Gerrit batters Britain December 29, 2023 5:17 AMOfficials warn that storm conditions are “making driving hazardous”, as a car carrying three men falls into a river.

13 hours ago · Singapore Read Full Article Malay Mail Lean Right Mixed Factuality Individual: Dato’ Siew Ka Wei Three dead as Storm Gerrit batters Britain LONDON, Dec 29 — Three people died yesterday after their car fell into a river in northern England, local police said, as Storm Gerrit battered much of the UK. Emergency services headed to the River Esk near the town of Glaisdale shortly before midday (1200 GMT), after reports that a vehicle had fallen into the river. “The vehicle was recovered from the river by the fire service just after 3:00 pm. Sadly, the three men inside have died,” North …
